data.comment: The match is underway at Allianz Field.
Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 2, Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Salt Lake's Giuseppe Rossi is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In the minute 6, Throw-in high up the field for Salt Lake in Saint Paul.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Important block from the Minnesota defence as Erik Holt fires in a strike for Salt Lake.
In the minute 8, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
The match at Allianz Field has been interrupted briefly for a check on Romain Metanire, who is down injured.
Minnesotaâ€™s Romain Metanire is on his feet again at Allianz Field.
In the minute 9, Free kick Salt Lake.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Salt Lake pushes forward through Giuseppe Rossi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
In the minute 15, In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Marcos De Oliveira waits before resuming play because Osvaldo Alonso for Minnesota is still down.
Minnesota's Osvaldo Alonso is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Osvaldo Alonso, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Hassani Dotson is the substitute for Minnesota.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Minnesota push forward at Allianz Field and Jan Gregus gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Salt Lake defence.
In the minute 20, Minnesota are pushing forward but Jan Gregus's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Salt Lake.
Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Minnesota.
Minnesota needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Free kick Salt Lake.
In the minute 25, In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Minnesota.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Salt Lake at Allianz Field.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hassani Dotson (Minnesota) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 32, Can Minnesota capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Salt Lake's half?
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Allianz Field.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
In the minute 36, Minnesota are coming forward and Kevin Molino gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 37, Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Salt Lake at Allianz Field.
Throw-in Minnesota.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to Minnesota's area.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Allianz Field.
Minnesota have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 43, In Saint Paul Minnesota attack through Robin Lod. The finish is off target, however.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Salt Lake's Douglas Martinez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Allianz Field.
The second-half is underway at Allianz Field.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Marcos De Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Minnesota are caught offside.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 51, Salt Lake have a goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Minnesota.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Goal! Chase Gasper gives Minnesota a 1-0 lead in Saint Paul.
Kevin Molino with an assist there.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Minnesota.
Emanuel Reynoso (Minnesota) has received a yellow card from Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 57, Kevin Molino (Minnesota) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 62, Goal! Robin Lod extends Minnesota's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Emanuel Reynoso.
Adrian Heath (Minnesota) is making a second substitution, with Jacori Hayes replacing Mason Toye.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Salt Lake's Nedum Onuoha goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 67, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Salt Lake.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 72, Minnesota needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
Raheem Edwards is replacing Emanuel Reynoso for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Paul.
Maikel Chang is on a sub for Douglas Martinez for Salt Lake.
In the minute 73, Salt Lake's Kyle Beckerman has been booked in Saint Paul.
Salt Lake make their first substitution with Corey Baird replacing Nick Besler.
In the minute 75, Jacori Hayes puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Great play from Raheem Edwards to set up the goal.
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Kyle Beckerman with Damir Kreilach.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
Freddy Juarez is making the team's third substitution at Allianz Field with Albert Rusnak replacing Giuseppe Rossi.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Minnesota's Robin Lod misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
In the minute 85, At Allianz Field, Salt Lake are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Salt Lake in Saint Paul.
Damir Kreilach of Salt Lake smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 89, Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Salt Lake are whistled for offside.
Free kick Minnesota.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Full-time! The final score is 4-0.
Minnesota take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Robin Lod.
Hassani Dotson instrumental with a fine assist.
